snippet.title: Summit - 2D Mountain Climbing Metroidvania - Pre-Alpha Trailer 02 (December 2020)
snippet.description:
Started end of this February, Summit has been my Corona pastime project this year. It’s been a pretty ambitious solo project and I’m really proud that I have come this far, considering I’m doing everything (programming, art, level design, music, writing) myself. 

=================================

Summit is a 2D Metroidvania in which you explore a giant open world that is located on a mountain massive. In order to ascend to the peak, you will discover the mysterious land and collect climbing gear that will gradually increase your movement options and abilities. The game combines challenging platforming with the joy of exploring a deep and dense world. 

=================================

https://dominikhackl.com
https://dominikhackl.com/project/summit
